Name: End of Hope
Effects: End of Primordial Round: Perform Signature

Name: Vanish X
Effects: Move the Primordial X spaces towards the closest Board Edge, without turning, ignoring Board Edges directly across from the Target or attacking Titan. If thes would move the Primordial beyond a Board Edge or outside of all ranges of light, it disappears. When the Primordial is outside the Battle Board, it cannot be affected in any way

Name: Pale Grin of Doom
Effects: When you are attacked from behind, ignore the Evasion Roll; the Attack automatically hits with all the dice

Name: Fear is Constant
Effects: <Start of Battle> Chosen Titan gains the [Fear|AL0299] Condition card, another Titan gains the [Terror] Condition card, a third one flips 1 Oxygen token

Name: Blacker Than The Night
Effects: When the Primordial performs {Vanish X}, it doesn't ignore the Board Edges directly across from the Target or attacking Titan

Name: Pale Grin of Death
Effects: When you are attacked from behind, ignore the Evasion Roll. You are immediately devoured (dead)

Name: Light is Dimming
Effects: If you don't have any {Light X} keyword, you are always considered to be attacked from behind

Name: Psychosomatic Poisoning
Effects: When you gain a Condition card, and each time you start your turn with a Condition card, gain 1 Ambrosia token

Name: Relentless Anxiety
Effects: When the Primordial vanishes, immediately draw an AI card

Name: Deeper Depths
Effects: Each Titan starts the Battle with 1 Oxygen token less

Name: Original Trench
Effects: Normal (not Terrain) Battle Board spaces are considered Terrain tiles with the {Chasm} keyword. All other Terrain is considered {Elevated}

Name: Beginning of the End
Effects: <End of Primordial Round> Before {End of Hope}, draw and perform another AI card

Name: Dragon of the Lightless Void
Effects: You can only use X amount of Opening or Closing tokens from the Kratos Pool. You can only use X amount of Break, Fire, Black, and Hope tokens from the Kratos Pool combined. X is equal to your Light X keyword

Name: Ruthless
Effects: Remove all positive Trauma cards from the Trauma decks (except Obols)

Name: Heat Death
Effects: Primordial doesn't destroy [Petrified Vent] Terrain tiles it moves through. Primordial's Crash causes incineration

Name: Microwave Shield
Effects: Before performing an Attack Roll, for each space between you and the Primordial, discard 1 token from the Kratos Pool

Name: Truth or Death
Effects: Before performing a Scan, declare if the Primordial is there. If you are not correct, after resolving the Scan, draw an Obol

Name: Invisible Flame
Effects: When you climb the VP, and when you start your turn on the VP, gain 1 Ambrosia token and 1 Pain token

Name: Nap of the Vent
Effects: Primordial destroys [Petrified Vent]Terrain tiles it moves through

Name: Tigerback
Effects: To leave the VP voluntarily, you need to pass a Climb Down test (same difficulty as the Climb test)

Name: Candle in the Dark
Effects: If your Light X is lower than the Primordial level divided by 2 (rounding up), Skitter loses @WoO

Name: Black Soup
Effects: If you fail to find the Primordial during the Titan Round, every Titan dies

Name: Three Seconds
Effects: Ignore @WoO preceding Microwave Attacks

Name: Imperial Leap
Effects: This Trait replaces the {Imperial Impetus} Trait and the effects of the {Imperial Impetus} keyword. *Imperial Impetus*: Place an [Ambrosia Cloud] Terrain tile beneath the Nosoi Dragon. The Nosoi Dragon moves onto the [Irem Tower] Terrain tile in front that is at least 11 spaces away from it. Then, all Titans in Zone 2 from the Nosoi Dragon gain 1 Ambrosia token and draw an Obol. This movement does not cause Crash. If the Nosoi Dragon cannot perform Imperial Impetus, move it onto the closest [Ambrosia Cloud] (if able) and perform Routine

Name: Enriched Toxins
Effects: Whenever a Titan would gain one or more Ambrosia tokens, they additionally gain 1 Midas token.

Name: Pollution Aura
Effects: Each Titan starts the Battle with 1 Oxygen token. If a Titan ends their turn in Zone 2 from the Nosoi Dragon, they discard 1 Oxygen token and gain 1 Ambrosia token. If, at any point, you must discard an Oxygen token and you don't have any, you die. Note; Do not use Cycle V Oxygen token rules

Name: God Given Law
Effects: Ignore @WoO preceding [Merciless Sun]

Name: Magnifying Glass
Effects: VP becomes unshaded. After a Titan fails a Climb test, perform Signature against that Titan

Name: Blinding Shine
Effects: The Old Haunt cannot be Wounded from the front

Name: Unworthy Will Die
Effects: At the end of the Primordial Round, the Old Haunt destroys the closest [Irem Tower]

Name: Cannot Hide from the Sun
Effects: Titan with the @PriorityTarget Priority Target token cannot be shaded in any way

Name: God Taken Law
Effects: When an [Irem Tower] is destroyed, each Titan adjacent to it is dealt X @Danger, where X is the number of Towers already removed

Name: Make the Sun Move and the Earth Stand Still
Effects: At the end of the Primordial Round, the Old Haunt appears at the closest Sun Circle

Name: Spontaneous Supernova
Effects: When the Old Haunt appears at a Sun Circle, all unshaded Titans are incinerated and destroy any Terrain tile that shaded a Titan, even if indestructible

Name: Gods Don't Look Back
Effects: Titans attacking from the Blindspot have an additional +1 Precision
